info.name: Upwork :: Dark Nightlancer :: Dark Theme [BETA]
info.description:
Upwork :: Dark Nightlancer :: Dark Theme Style ::

A working BETA Upwork Dark Theme style. 
Theme covers **daily regular** needs within the platform in terms of eyes strain (like Job Search, Messages, etc).

Any questions / issues / bugs / suggestions, write in comments below with a description. Please READ the "Major Development Brief" at the end of this message.

Education is always appreciated. Visit my other styles if you wish.


:: Major development Brief ::

So far I'm aware of the complete sections that needs to be included, these might be included in future releases. Those sections are:

• Main Menu Dropdown Top Triangle | Voice Call Features
• Timesheet Details | Earnings by Client | Weekly Timesheet | Transaction History | App Authorizations
• Job details slider background that appears when you click on a job
info.additionalInfo:
[Version 1.0.4]
• Style updates on "My Stats" section changes
• Style updates on "Saved Jobs" section changes
• Minor fixes on "Who viewed your profile" section

[Version 1.0.3]
• New Google Login included in the theme.

[Version 1.0.2]
• Updated to show the new changes in the main header menu of Upwork: - Search Bar - Dropdown Menus - Profile dropdown menu - 
• New section "Who viewed your profile" is now included in the theme
• Mayor fixes in the main header menu in the "Messages" section.
• Citations in Messages are now included in the theme.

[Version 1.0.1]
• Contracts / Jobs 3 dots button included in the theme
• All contract editor (Earnings/Messages/Terms) are now included in the theme.

Beta Release:
• This release has landed. Boom!
